BR.name: My First Songs 2
BR.description: agora você pode curtir My First Songs 2, o aplicativo musical interativo para crianças. My First Songs 2 apresenta uma nova lista de 14 músicas populares de crianças e deslumbrantes animações 3D. Cante junto e interaja estourando bolhas de notas: tente pegar todas! My First Songs 2 apresenta: 14 canções infantis populares Muitos animais Lista: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes Deck the Hall Ten Little Indians Hey Diddle Diddle Humpty Dumpty If You’re Happy and You Know It Little Miss Muffet Pop Goes the Weasel Row, Row, Row Your Boat The Muffin Man The Wheel on the Bus We Wish You A Merry Christmas Little Bo Peep Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone

CA.name: My First Songs 2
CA.description: You can now enjoy My First Songs 2, the interactive music game for kids. My First Songs 2 features a new playlist of 14 popular children’s songs as well as gorgeous 3D animations. Sing along and interact by popping bubble notes: try to catch them all! My First Songs 2 features: 14 popular children’s songs Lots of animals Playlist: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes Deck the Hall Ten Little Indians Hey Diddle Diddle Humpty Dumpty If You’re Happy and You Know It Little Miss Muffet Pop Goes the Weasel Row, Row, Row Your Boat The Muffin Man The Wheel on the Bus We Wish You A Merry Christmas Little Bo Peep Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone

MX.name: My First Songs 2
MX.description: Ahora puede disfrutar de My First Songs 2, la aplicación de música interactiva para niños. My First Songs 2 contiene una nueva lista de reproducción de 14 canciones populares infantiles, así como magníficas animaciones en 3D. Canta e interactúa explotando burbujas con notas: ¡trata de cogerlas todas! My First Songs 2 contiene: 14 canciones populares infantiles Montones de animales Lista de reproducción: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes Deck the Hall Ten Little Indians Hey Diddle Diddle Humpty Dumpty If You’re Happy and You Know It Little Miss Muffet Pop Goes the Weasel Row, Row, Row Your Boat The Muffin Man The Wheel on the Bus We Wish You A Merry Christmas Little Bo Peep Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone
